meanings.definition: Not having the qualities of poetry or song.
meanings.sent1: The speech was unlyrical and lacked any poetic charm.
meanings.sent2: Her unlyrical voice made it difficult to enjoy the song.
meanings.sent3: The unlyrical humming of the machine made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unlyrical prose of the manual was as dull as a gray sky.
meanings.sent5: The unlyrical performance failed to capture the audience's attention.

meanings.definition: Lacking in poetic or musical qualities.
meanings.sent1: The unlyrical painting did not evoke any emotions.
meanings.sent2: His unlyrical guitar playing left much to be desired.
meanings.sent3: The unlyrical dance moves made the audience giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her unlyrical poetry fell flat like a deflated balloon.
meanings.sent5: The unlyrical melody failed to resonate with the listeners.
